member.name: T:Interface_application.Circle
member.summary: Represents a drawable circle shape that inherits from the base class. Allows setting its position and drawing it on a graphics surface.

member.name: F:Interface_application.Circle.x
member.summary: The X-coordinate of the center of the circle.

member.name: F:Interface_application.Circle.y
member.summary: The Y-coordinate of the center of the circle.

member.name: F:Interface_application.Circle.size
member.summary: The radius of the circle (constant size).

member.name: M:Interface_application.Circle.SetPosition(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the position of the circle on the drawing surface.
member.param: The X-coordinate of the circle's center.
The Y-coordinate of the circle's center.

member.name: M:Interface_application.Circle.Draw(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Pen)
member.summary: Draws the circle on the provided graphics surface using the specified pen.
member.param: The graphics object used to draw the circle.
The pen used to outline the circle.

member.name: M:Interface_application.Circle.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the circle, including its position and size.
member.returns: A string describing the circle's properties.

member.name: T:Interface_application.Form1
member.summary: Main application form responsible for displaying and drawing graphical shapes.

member.summary: Circle instance used for drawing on the form.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and sets up the circle object.

member.summary: Handles all custom drawing operations for the form. This method is triggered automatically whenever the form needs repainting.
member.param: Contains the graphics context used for drawing.

member.summary: Required designer variable.

member.name: T:Interface_application.Shapes
member.summary: Defines the basic structure and behavior required for drawable shapes, including setting their position, drawing them, and returning a textual description.

member.name: M:Interface_application.Shapes.SetPosition(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the position of the shape on the drawing surface.

member.name: M:Interface_application.Shapes.Draw(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Pen)
member.summary: Draws the shape on the given graphics surface using the provided pen.

The pen used to outline the shape.
